= 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{FCC ST|11/21/2015|indexme.}} :[http://www.myopenrouter.com Open Source support] *[[Netgear D7800]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D7800.aspx Nighthawk X4S AC2600 VDSL/ADSL Modem Router] :CPU: IPQ8064 @1.4GHz Dual Core SoC + [[Lantiq]] VR10 (ADSL2+/VDSL2) :QCA8337(Switch) + VRX320(VDSL) + QCA9980(5GHz) + QCA9980(2.4GHz) :512MB RAM/128MB ROM, 2x USB 3.0, 1x eSATA, 4x+1x GbE, 4x int./ext. ant. *OEM: [[Delta Networks]] - Board ID: 2976495801 :Hardware ID: 29764958+0+128+512+4x4+4x4 :• [[Netgear R7800]]/[[Netgear R7500v2|R7500v2]] - HW ID:2976495801 {{See also|Netgear XR450|Netgear XR500}} ===Product features=== *Quad-Stream AC2600 Wi-Fi for speeds up to 2.53Gbps (1733+800 Mbps) *Next generation Wave2 Wi-Fi (MU-MIMO, 256 QAM support) *Dual Core 1.4GHz processor boosts performance for gaming and streaming *Gigabit Ethernet WAN port for universal Internet service compatibility *Built in high speed modem compatible with VDSL2, ADSL2, ADSL2+ *Twin USB 3.0 and eSATA ports for external storage *Dynamic QoS bandwidth prioritization by application and device ===Specifications=== *Dual Core @1.4GHz processor boosts performance *Wi-Fi Performance: AC2600 (800 Mbps + 1733 Mbps) *Simultaneous Dual Band 2.4 GHz & 5 GHz *One (1x GbE) WAN port provides universal compatibility *Five (5x GbE) 10/100/1000 Ports with auto-sensing technology *DSL Modem—Compatible with VDSL, VDSL2, ADSL, ADSL2, ADSL2+ *One (1x RJ11) DSL port, supports ADSL2/ADSL2+ and VDSL/VDSL2 *Two (2x) USB 3.0 ports, One (1x) eSATA port *Dimension: [[Dimensions::285 mm x 185 mm x 50 mm]] (WxHxD) *Weight: [[Weight::840 g]] ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/archive/index.php/t-2631463.html ''Netgear D7800'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] :Perhaps the discussion of the '''D7800''' should be split to a separate thread. :I think all current Lantiq devices are based on the VR9 family, the VRX268 :or VRX288 chips, which have been around for a few years now. :The D7800 uses the next generation [[Lantiq]] chip, VR10 family, it's the first :device I've seen that does: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] from: d7800_gpl_source_list.txt :IPQ8064(CPU) + QCA8337(Sw) + VRX320(DSL) + QCA9982(5GHz) + QCA9880(2.4GHz) :The DSL firmware contained within the Netgear firmware image is: :dsl_vr10_firmware_xdsl-07.07.04.03.00.07_07.07.01.08.00.01.bin :HH5A - Lantiq VRX268, HH5B - Broadcom 
+define Device/D7800
+	$(call Device/DniImage)
+	DEVICE_DTS := qcom-ipq8064-d7800
+	KERNEL_SIZE := 2097152 
+	NETGEAR_BOARD_ID := D7800
+	NETGEAR_HW_ID := 29764958+0+128+512+4x4+4x4
+define Profile/D7800
+	NAME:=Netgear Nighthawk X4 D7800
+	PACKAGES:= \
+		kmod-usb-core kmod-usb-ohci kmod-usb2 kmod-ledtrig-usbdev \
+		kmod-usb3 kmod-usb-dwc3-qcom kmod-usb-phy-qcom-dwc3 \
+		kmod-ath10k wpad-mini ath10k-firmware-qca99x0
+endef
+
+define Profile/D7800/Description
+	Package set for the Netgear Nighthawk X4 D7800
*[[Netgear D7800]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D7800.aspx Nighthawk X4S AC2600 WiFi VDSL/ADSL Modem Router] :CPU: IPQ8064 @1.4GHz Dual Core SoC + Lantiq VR10 (ADSL2+/VDSL2) :QCA8337(Switch) + VRX320(DSL) + QCA9982(5GHz) + QCA9880(2.4GHz) :512MB RAM/128MB ROM, 2x USB 3.0, 1x eSATA, 4x+1x GbE, 4x int./ext. antennas ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|BCM63xxDSL}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_d7800 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/d7800 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=60169 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq806x |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a15_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/dsl_modem DSL modem] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== :;[[Netgear D series]] • [[Netgear]] *[[Netgear D7000]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D7000.aspx Nighthawk AC1900 WiFi ADSL/VDSL Modem Router] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63138 @1GHz (ARM Dual Core) xDSL/Router SoC *[[Netgear D6400]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6400.aspx AC1600 WiFi VDSL/ADSL Modem Router] • [http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2716536 HWU] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 @400MHz (MIPS Dual Core) xDSL/Router WiSoC *[[Netgear D6300]]v2 - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6300.aspx AC1600 WiFi DSL Modem Router] :[[Lantiq]] AR10 (ADSL2+) + [[Lantiq]] VRX318 (VDSL2) *[[Netgear D6200v2]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6200.aspx AC1200 WiFi DSL Modem Router] :[[Lantiq]] AR10 (ADSL2+) *[[Netgear D6100]] - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6100.aspx AC1200 WLAN Modem Router] :[[Lantiq]] AR10 ARX368 (ADSL2+), 128/128MB ROM/RAM :1x WAN, 2x LAN GbE, N300+AC867, antenna int. (2+2) *[[Netgear D6000]] - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6000.aspx AC750 WiFi DSL Modem Router] :CPU: [[Ralink]]/Mediatek RT63368F + RT63087N (AFE) (ADSL2+) *[[Netgear D3600]] - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D3600.aspx N600 WiFi DSL Modem Router] :CPU: [[Ralink]]/Mediatek RT63368F + RT63087N (AFE) (ADSL2+) *[[Netgear D2200D]] - [http://www.netgear.com/service-providers/products/telco/gateways/d2200d.aspx ADSL Gateway] • FCC ID: PY314400297 *[[Netgear VEVG3000]] • [[Lantiq]] VRX318 + GRX (VDSL2 Bonding) *[[Netgear MVBR1000v4]] (LTE/Mobile) [[Category:English Documentation]]
